name: C.O.R.E. (itch)
description:
C.O.R.E. - Control of Restoration Earth

Is a game that depicts the story of two robots created by humand, that were designed to work together in going down to the center of the earth.

How To Play? Tesla Bot:
  • WASD - Move
  • Space Bar - Activate sparks
Hook Bot:
  • Arrow keys - Move
  • Left mouse button - Shoot hook
  • Mouse move - Aim hook

If you liked our game, please support us liking our social media pages:

  • https://www.instagram.com/xdgamestudio/
